## Description {#details}

An floating-point-like constant.

It abstracts over scalar, fixed-length vectors, and scalable vectors. In the common case, it provides a common API and feels like an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a>, while still providing low-level access. It can be used for constant-folding.

bool <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lint-cpp/#a45005634b54e2126cb3e6ec0dbc9ade4">isZero()</a> abstracts over the kind.

switch(const.getKind()) &#123; &#125; provides low-level access.

Definition at line 656 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/utils-h">Utils.h</a>.
